short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to get the basic user info about a DrillPlan Project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the DrillPlan user to send troubleshooting information to the Support DrillPlan Drilling Engineer
The user only needs to be a DELFI registered user with at least one subscription active (DrillPlan Guest or DrillPlan- Plus). 
Install this extension if you need to send basic user info to the support team
